Time spent indoor tanning is a **input factor**. It means that it is one of the inputs from the user to the model.

#### Alternative names:
* Sunbed time
* Indoor Tanning
* Time spent indoor tanning
* IndoorTanning

#### Uses

Time spent indoor tanning is used by the model in the following places

* as a risk factor for [Skin cancer](/model/SkinCancer)

#### Guidance

The user input is a typed number and should answer the question

> How much time have you spent in indoor tanning beds in your life?

The unit of the input is **Hours**.

The answer has to be larger than 0 Hours.The answer is recommended to be larger than 0 Hours and smaller than 60 Hours, because that is where the model is most accurate.

### Optimizability

[Optimizability](/model/optimizabilities) is a subjective measure used to describe how easy it is to optimize a certain factor of your life. The optimizability of Time spent indoor tanning is [3](/model/optimizabilities#category-3). This means that it can be interpreted as



> *It is impossible to change now, but it has once definitely been in your control*
